transit.name: Uber
transit.description: You can use Uber to get to or from the Airport, or to get from your hotel to the conference.

transit.name: Metro Cars
transit.description: You can use Metro Cars to get to or from the Airport, or to get from your hotel to the conference.

transit.name: Detroit City Bus
transit.description: Service is all over downtown, and google maps transit directions will get you the info you need. $1.50 to ride, $0.25 to transfer

transit.name: Detroit People Mover
transit.description: This train is a downtown circulator, and it costs $0.75 per ride.

transit.name: Cabs
transit.description: Cabs in the city are notoriously slow if you call. If you must call, try your luck on yelp. Your best bet is to hail a cab by your hotel, or use your hotel shuttle if you need a lift.

transit.name: Smart Bus
transit.description: The Smart bus is the regional suburban bus system, and it costs $2.00 per ride. The 125 line goes to the Airport, but service is very limited and takes about 90 minutes.

transit.name: Just Walk
transit.description: Weâ€™ve tried hard to make sure API Craft Conference is held downtown, and that you have access to hotels within walking distance. You should be able to walk to everything on the agenda.
